name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: file.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: dfs.namenode.max.extra.edits.segments.retained
description:
The maximum number of extra edit log segments which should be retained
  beyond what is minimally necessary for a NN restart. When used in conjunction with
  dfs.namenode.num.extra.edits.retained, this configuration property serves to cap
  the number of extra edits files to a reasonable value.

name: dfs.datanode.metrics.logger.period.seconds
description:
This setting controls how frequently the DataNode logs its metrics. The
    logging configuration must also define one or more appenders for
    DataNodeMetricsLog for the metrics to be logged.
    DataNode metrics logging is disabled if this value is set to zero or
    less than zero.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.retry.max.attempts
description:
Max retry to satisfy the block storage policy. After this retry block will be removed
    from the movement needed queue.

name: dfs.namenode.block.deletion.increment
description:
The number of block deletion increment.
      This setting will control the block increment deletion rate to
      ensure that other waiters on the lock can get in.

name: dfs.client.block.write.retries
description:
The number of retries for writing blocks to the data nodes, 
  before we signal failure to the application.
